## ZaÅ‚adowanie zbioru danych

```{r load_dataset}
data = read.csv(".\\WA_Fn-UseC_-Telco-Customer-Churn.csv")
dim(data)
```

```{r divide_into_test_train}
data$categorization = substr(data$customerID, 0, 4) > "2500"
train <- data$categorization == TRUE
data_train <- data[train,]
data_test <- data[!train,]
data_train = subset(data_train, select = -c(categorization, customerID))
data_test = subset(data_test, select = -c(categorization, customerID))
mean(data_test$MonthlyCharges)
mean(data_train$MonthlyCharges)
dim(data_train)[1] / dim(data_test)[1]
dim(data_train)
dim(data_test)
```
